title: Sort the automatic message for a Business Account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: A short-term access token authorized by the TikTok Business Account owner. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: auto_message_type
parameters.description: The type of automatic message. Enum value: CHAT_PROMPT : chat prompt. A chat prompt is an interactive button displayed above the input box. When users tap a chat prompt, the system will automatically generate a corresponding question for users to start the conversation.

parameters.name: auto_message_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the chat prompts in the desired order. The first ID in the ID list will be the first prompt button that is displayed above the input box. To retrieve the existing chat prompts of a Business Account, use /business/message/auto_message/get/ .
